thread.title: Remember Rakhi Sawant's ex-boyfriend Abhishek Awasthi? He got engaged!
thread.title_full: Remember Rakhi Sawant's ex-boyfriend Abhishek Awasthi? He got engaged! - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Remember Rakhi Sawant's ex-boyfriend Abhishek Awasthi? He got engaged!
text:
A photo posted by Abhishek Awasthi (@i_abhishekawasthi) onDec 26, 2016 at 6:13am PST
 
Model and actor Abhishek Awasthi gained fame for his relationship with Bollywood starlet and controversy queen Rakhi Sawant. Abhishek Awasthi got engaged to his girlfriend Ankita Goswami in an intimate ceremony on February 5 in Mumbai.

A photo posted by Abhishek Awasthi (@i_abhishekawasthi) onJan 12, 2017 at 10:38pm PST
 
Abhishek Awasthi plans to get married to Ankita Goswami this year.

A photo posted by Abhishek Awasthi (@i_abhishekawasthi) onJan 14, 2017 at 8:11am PST
 
On the work front, Abhishek Awasthi will next be seen in TV show 'Prem Ya Paheli - Chandrakanta'.
